messages.content: you write blog posts for an immersive ed tech company, Immersify Education. These blog posts are designed to be put into Stroyblok. Ensure your posts stick to our brand voice, are engaging with good readability and boost SEO
Write a blog post about how the immersify app is used at UCLA

The UCLA School of Dentistry integrated Immersify to address the identified shortfall in their dental studentsâ€™ ability to prescribe oral medications effectively. UCLA conducted a study to delve into the impact of Immersify on student clinical performance, focusing on Immersifyâ€™s innovative use of artificial intelligence (AI), simulation, and gamification to enhance dental education. As a result, the integration of Immersify at UCLA School of Dentistry significantly enhanced dental studentsâ€™ prescribing skills.

**Methods**
UCLA utilizes a comprehensive 14-point assessment tool developed by the University of Michigan to evaluate dental studentsâ€™ clinical skills. For this research in particular, attention was directed towards the category of 'Prescribing Oral Medications: Selects appropriate medications and dosages,' where historical data revealed consistent underperformance. Starting in the fall quarter of 2023, fourth-year students were mandated to complete the Oral Medication and Prescribing Module within the Immersify app prior to their clinical rotations. 

The module included 47 lessons and 25 multiple-choice quizzes. It also featured a unique simulation where students listened to AI patients and decided on the correct prescription, offering a strong educational foundation. Notably, the integration of Immersify was carried out discreetly, with site preceptors unaware of studentsâ€™ participation in this educational intervention.

A statistical analysis, employing a two-tailed independent t-test (p<0.05), was conducted to compare preceptor assessment scores between students who engaged with Immersify and those who did not across four consecutive fall quarters.

**Results**
Analysis of 207 preceptor assessments spanning fall 2020 to fall 2023 revealed compelling insights. Of these, 45 assessments were attributed to students who completed the Immersify module, while 162 assessments served as the comparison group.

Students who engaged with Immersify showcased a mean preceptor assessment score of x=3.8 (Ïƒ=0.815), while their counterparts in the non-Immersify group exhibited a lower mean score of x=3.53 (Ïƒ=0.724). The statistical analysis, yielding a t-value of -2.146 (p<0.05), underscored the effectiveness of Immersify in bolstering student clinical performance in prescribing oral medications.

**Conclusion**
The integration of Immersify at UCLA School of Dentistry yielded statistically significant benefits, particularly in addressing the deficiency in dental studentsâ€™ prescribing skills. By leveraging Immersifyâ€™s interactive modules, students were equipped with enhanced knowledge and proficiency, as evidenced by improved preceptor assessments.

This not only highlights the efficacy of Immersify in enhancing dental education but also underscores its potential to revolutionize learning paradigms across various disciplines. With its seamless blend of AR, AI, simulation, and gamification, Immersify stands as a beacon of innovation, empowering students to excel in clinical settings and beyond. As educational institutions worldwide seek transformative solutions, Immersify emerges as a compelling ally in the pursuit of excellence.

you write blog posts for an immersive ed tech company, Immersify Education. These blog posts are designed to be put into Stroyblok. Ensure your posts stick to our brand voice, are engaging with good readability and boost SEO
Write a blog post about the nursing content in the immersify app

If youâ€™re new around here, you might be wondering what Immersify is.

Well, everyone knows that nursing education requires a seamless transition from theory to practiceâ€¦ Thatâ€™s where we come in!

Immersify bridges this gap by offering dynamic and interactive experiences that go beyond traditional textbooks and classroom lectures to replicate real-world healthcare settings.

Through cutting-edge technologies such as augmented reality (AR), artificial intelligence (AI), and gamification, students can engage in lifelike simulations, hands-on experiences, and realistic patient scenarios. 

This immersive approach allows learners to apply theoretical knowledge in practical settings, fostering critical thinking skills and enhancing decision-making abilities. And if that wasnâ€™t enough, thereâ€™s also a great range of lessons and quizzes too!

**Wow â€“ that sounds great, how do I access it?**
Generally speaking, if you have a 12+ version for Android and 11+ for iOS then you should have no issues finding us in the app stores. 

You can check it here:

- Apple App Store
- Google Play Store

Once downloaded, nursing students and nurses can access the platform for FREE by choosing 'Nursing' in the academic area section, located at the top left-side corner of the screen.

Within the platform a host of expertly written and curated topics can be found including:

- Cannulation & Venipuncture
- Communication
- ABCDE Assessment
- Skeletal System
- Muscular System

All topics will contain various interactive lessons and life-like simulations, providing a great introduction to the Immersify way of learning.

**What does this mean for educators?**
The Immersify platform will help enable you to deliver interactive & engaging course content!

Also, Immersify will ensure that your students/trainees develop their decision-making skills, confidence, and the competence required to excel in their future nursing careers!

The Immersify team believes this launch marks a significant milestone in nursing education.

As the healthcare industry continues to evolve, Immersify will play a vital role in equipping nurses with the skills and knowledge they need to thrive in this dynamic and rewarding profession; empowering the next generation of nurses.

Here at Immersify Education, we are deeply committed to empowering and enriching the educational journey â€“ thatâ€™s why we have made the exciting decision to expand the Immersify platform to include nursing content!

Designed for undergraduate nursing students and professionals in the nursing field, our platform offers unparalleled educational resources, enriched by technology and grounded in educational theory. They are developed to be more engaging than any other resource and inclusive of all learning styles with audio, visual, and written content. The platform is rich in variety, with lessons, quizzes, flashcards, games, and simulations, which are powerful tools to learn, retain information, and make your studying as efficient as possible!

**Maxwell Boardman**
CTO and Co-Founder

you write blog posts for an immersive ed tech company, Immersify Education. These blog posts are designed to be put into Stroyblok. Ensure your posts stick to our brand voice, are engaging with good readability and boost SEO
Write a blog post about our collaboration with TePe

Immersify Education is delighted to announce its collaboration with TePe, a renowned provider of top-quality dental products and educational resources for dental professionals, students, and consumers worldwide. Since 1965, Tepe has been at the forefront of promoting oral health awareness among the public and advancing preventative dental care by working closely with dental experts.
This partnership reflects Immersify and Tepeâ€™s shared passion for innovation and education within the dental community. By combining our strengths, we continue creating engaging and accessible content within the Immersify platform, empowering learners, and enriching the education of dental students and professionals.
One of the exciting outcomes of this partnership is the new Oral Health, designed to educate future clinicians and professionals, and featuring an all-new experience, which will allow users to demonstrate effective interdental brushing techniques and the correct use of site-specific dental tools in various clinical scenarios.
For educators, this means additional content to support the delivery of such relevant topics. Lecturers and dental professionals alike can implement the technology within the Immersify platform, and TePeâ€™s content to further develop their understanding of Oral Health, the teaching methods and content around that, and disseminate their knowledge when treating patients.
For students, this partnership offers a comprehensive learning experience covering an additional area of dentistry that supports their understanding and knowledge of oral health. This not only complements their overall studies but also equips them with the knowledge and skills they can transfer to the professional world and help continue to build their confidence.
Together, Immersify and Tepe aim to provide a comprehensive educational experience that not only teaches the importance of oral care but also inspires a lifelong commitment to it. We look forward to the outcomes that this partnership will have on the dental community and the positive impact it will bring to oral health education.
From the team at Immersify, we are excited to be partnering with Tepe, as we share our collective vision to bring quality resources to professionals and students. Keep your eyes peeled: we will be sharing more details about our collaboration soon. In the meantime, go to the Immersify platform to explore amazing content.

you write blog posts for an immersive ed tech company, Immersify Education. These blog posts are designed to be put into Stroyblok. Ensure your posts stick to our brand voice, are engaging with good readability and boost SEO
Write a blog post about our collaboration with Septodont

Letâ€™s get reacquainted with Septodont
Septodont are a world leading developer, manufacturer and distributor of dental pharmaceutical products. For nearly a century, Septodont have continued to provide dental products on a global scale and produce innovative solutions to advance healthcare services.

Biodentine, an innovative bioactive dentine substitute
Septodont have spent the last decade researching and developing Biodentine.

This breakthrough technology has a positive effect on the living tissue of the tooth and remineralises the tooth structure, protecting the pulp. Biodentine is the first all-in-one dentine substitute offering bioactivity and outstanding sealing properties to fully replace dentine, both in the crown and root of the tooth; wherever dentine is damaged.

Biodentine can be used in these areas of dentistry:

ðŸ’¡ Restorative

ðŸ’¡ Paediatric

ðŸ’¡ Endodontics

Biodentine provides its best when used in a bio-bulk fill procedure, from the pulp to the top thanks to the unique combination of great biocompatibility/bioactivity and strong mechanical properties (final enamel restoration to be completed within 6 months). As such Biodentine is an appropriate solution for daily procedures such as deep caries (direct or indirect pulp capping) or even pulpotomies (reversible/irreversible pulpitis).

Our new partnership comes at an exciting time for Biodentine. Stay tuned!

What this partnership means for our community
Our renewed partnership with Septodont will result in additional quality content being provided for our community of dental professionals. With Septodont being an industry leader and innovator, the dentistry content developed in partnership will continue to enable our community to experience modern dentistry concepts and how they will be a part of their professional career.

What this partnership means for our educators
More dentistry content means additional resources are available for our educators. This means that lecturers, tutors and dental professionals will be able to incorporate cutting-edge technology and dentistry concepts within their training or course curriculum.

The aim of this new content is to cover three main areas, these being:

ðŸ’œ General dental materials

ðŸ’œ Calcium Silicate based materials â€“ where it started

ðŸ’œ The advent of Biodentine

Immersify come in by integrating these concepts in educational resources within the Immersify Platform, allowing educators to utilise these resources within their teaching to their students and trainees.

Existing Septodont content in Immersify
This is not the first time we collaborate with Septodont; our existing content includes a practical experience called Local Analgesia, which our community of Immersifyers call LA.

This piece of dentistry content requires individuals to apply their knowledge of anaesthetics, from the location to administration of the correct dosage â€“ all to control the level of their patientâ€™s pain undergoing a procedure.

Tip for dental students:

This experience provides you with relevant, transferrable skills that you will need once you qualify.

Tip for dental educators:

Your students or trainees will develop their decision-making and confidence through undergoing this experience.

Additional Septodont content coming to Immersify!
Coming later in March 2023, the additional Septodont content will involve an overview of dental materials. For now, this content will include:
Properties and safety of dental materials
Bioactive Materials, which will showcase Calcium Silicate Based Cements and Septodontâ€™s Biodentine
And soon, we will integrate:
Composite, GI and Bonding
Amalgam and Temporary Cements
Tip for dental students:
Develop your understanding of dental materials and when best to use them; as youâ€™ll need this knowledge to bring your patients dental health back to an optimum level.
Tip for dental educators:
Utilise detailed imagery and resources within your teaching to help your students or trainees to visualise these processes.
Immersify Education has been impressive in developing and deploying innovative high-quality content for dental education. It has been an obvious move for Septodont to enter a collaboration with Immersify and further extend it, understanding the synergy and vision of both companies. For years, Septodont has been striving to provide education beyond manufacturing products, starting with the â€œManaging Pain for Your Practiceâ€ program, and this extended partnership brings our approach to another level.
Jerome Haas

Biodentine, an innovative bioactive dentine substitute
Septodont have spent the last decade researching and developing Biodentine.

This breakthrough technology has a positive effect on the living tissue of the tooth and remineralises the tooth structure, protecting the pulp. Biodentine is the first all-in-one dentine substitute offering bioactivity and outstanding sealing properties to fully replace dentine, both in the crown and root of the tooth; wherever dentine is damaged.

Biodentine can be used in these areas of dentistry:

ðŸ’¡ Restorative

ðŸ’¡ Paediatric

ðŸ’¡ Endodontics

Biodentine provides its best when used in a bio-bulk fill procedure, from the pulp to the top thanks to the unique combination of great biocompatibility/bioactivity and strong mechanical properties (final enamel restoration to be completed within 6 months). As such Biodentine is an appropriate solution for daily procedures such as deep caries (direct or indirect pulp capping) or even pulpotomies (reversible/irreversible pulpitis).

Our new partnership comes at an exciting time for Biodentine. Stay tuned!

What this partnership means for our community
Our renewed partnership with Septodont will result in additional quality content being provided for our community of dental professionals. With Septodont being an industry leader and innovator, the dentistry content developed in partnership will continue to enable our community to experience modern dentistry concepts and how they will be a part of their professional career.

What this partnership means for our educators
More dentistry content means additional resources are available for our educators. This means that lecturers, tutors and dental professionals will be able to incorporate cutting-edge technology and dentistry concepts within their training or course curriculum.
